techmeme.title: OpenAI debuts a Responses API to help devs build agents that search the web, scan for files, and perform tasks on computers, and an Agents SDK for orchestration (Emma Roth/The Verge)
A look at Crypto.com's perplexing trading volume surge, up 10x in 2024 per CoinGecko, vaulting it to the top tier of exchanges, as rivals question its growth (Jeff John Roberts/Fortune)
Dexterity, maker of industrial robots that have "human-like" finesse, raised $95M at a $1.65B valuation, up from $1.4B in 2021, bringing total funding to ~$300M (Bloomberg)
Waymo expands its operating area around Silicon Valley to a 27 square-mile region, including Mountain View, Palo Alto, Los Altos, and parts of Sunnyvale (Andrew J. Hawkins/The Verge)
Sources: VCs with "locked" tokens are working with market makers to hedge their positions; Tokenomist: 2024's largest unlocks brought $5.4B+ into circulation (Ryan Weeks/Bloomberg)
